wiktionary_senses.definition: The condition of not being threatened, especially physically, psychologically, emotionally, or financially.
An organization or department responsible for providing security by enforcing laws, rules, and regulations as well as maintaining order.
Something that secures the fulfillment of an obligation or law.
A tradeable financial asset, such as a share of stock or any of various classes of bond.ᵂ
Proof of ownership of stocks, bonds or other investment instruments.
Property etc. temporarily relinquished to guarantee repayment of a loan.
